testcase.name: testExecute
testcase.system-out: execute insert into drive(id, date, factureprice, truck, trailer, driver) values('1050', '2023-12-16', '500.0','RA013CD','AA447RA', '12345678') Uspesno sam sacuvao u bazi insert into costlist(id, total, drive) values('1050', '1200.0', '1050') Uspesno sam sacuvao u bazi insert into costitem(costList, costtype, amount) values('1050', 'driverSallary', '300.0') Uspesno sam sacuvao u bazi insert into costitem(costList, costtype, amount) values('1050', 'fuel', '300.0') Uspesno sam sacuvao u bazi insert into costitem(costList, costtype, amount) values('1050', 'toll', '300.0') Uspesno sam sacuvao u bazi insert into costitem(costList, costtype, amount) values('1050', 'other', '300.0') Uspesno sam sacuvao u bazi SELECT d.id, d.date, d.factureprice, d.truck, d.trailer, d.driver, t.loadcapacity AS "dozvoljena tezina", tr.productyear AS "godina kamiona", tr.weight, t.productyear AS "godina prikolice", t.weight as "tezina prikolice", dr.idcard FROM drive d JOIN vehicle tr ON d.truck = tr.registrationmark JOIN vehicle t ON t.registrationmark = d.trailer JOIN driver dr ON d.driver = dr.idcard where id = '1050' localhost3306transportapprootrootjdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/transportapp Successfully connected to database! Uspostavljena je konekcija sa bazom delete from costitem where costlist = '1050' AND costType = 'driversallary' Uspostavljena je konekcija sa bazom delete from costitem where costlist = '1050' AND costType = 'fuel' Uspostavljena je konekcija sa bazom delete from costitem where costlist = '1050' AND costType = 'toll' Uspostavljena je konekcija sa bazom delete from costitem where costlist = '1050' AND costType = 'other' Uspostavljena je konekcija sa bazom delete from costlist where id=1050 Uspostavljena je konekcija sa bazom delete from drive where id=1050 COMMIT
